Defiler's Doom.name: Defiler's Doom
Defiler's Doom.fullText:
Emerald Guardian Attack 11Defiler's Doom

A target that flees from your first attack is drawn back to face a second.

Encounter        Primal, Teleportation, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target is not adjacent to you at the end of its next turn, you teleport it to a square adjacent to you and make a melee basic attack against it as a free action.


Published in Primal Power, page(s) 109.
Defiler's Doom.flavor: A target that flees from your first attack is drawn back to face a second.
Defiler's Doom.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target is not adjacent to you at the end of its next turn, you teleport it to a square adjacent to you and make a melee basic attack against it as a free action.

Form of the Life-Giver.name: Form of the Life-Giver
Form of the Life-Giver.fullText:
Emerald Guardian Attack 20Form of the Life-Giver

You appear to increase in size as you take on the form of the legendary life-giver, granting vitality to your allies.

Daily        Healing, Polymorph, Primal
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You assume the guardian form of the life-giver until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, your size is Large. In addition, you gain resist 20 necrotic. Any ally that starts his or her turn within 3 squares of you regains 5 hit points.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Life-Giver Attack power while you are in this form.


Form of the Life-Giver Attack

Encounter      Healing, Polymorph, Primal, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon + 1 reach

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. Fortitude

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. The target is stunned (save ends).

  Each Failed Saving Throw: One ally within 3 squares of the target can spend a healing surge.

Miss: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

  Each Failed Saving Throw: One ally within 3 squares of the target can spend a healing surge.

Requirement: The power Form of the Life-Giver must be active in order to use this power.


Published in Primal Power, page(s) 109.
Form of the Life-Giver.flavor: You appear to increase in size as you take on the form of the legendary life-giver, granting vitality to your allies.
Form of the Life-Giver.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the life-giver until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, your size is Large. In addition, you gain resist 20 necrotic. Any ally that starts his or her turn within 3 squares of you regains 5 hit points.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Life-Giver Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Life-Giver.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. The target is stunned (save ends).
Form of the Life-Giver.eachFailedSavingThrow: One ally within 3 squares of the target can spend a healing surge.
Form of the Life-Giver.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Form of the Life-Giver.requirement: The power Form of the Life-Giver must be active in order to use this power.

Preservation of the Wild.name: Preservation of the Wild
Preservation of the Wild.fullText:
Emerald Guardian Utility 12Preservation of the Wild

The spirits of nature destroy lingering magic at your command.

Daily        Primal
Standard Action      Close burst 3

Effect: All conjurations and zones in the burst are destroyed. In addition, ongoing necrotic damage ends on each creature in the burst.


Published in Primal Power, page(s) 109.
Preservation of the Wild.flavor: The spirits of nature destroy lingering magic at your command.
Preservation of the Wild.effect: All conjurations and zones in the burst are destroyed. In addition, ongoing necrotic damage ends on each creature in the burst.
